column4: ive created a wee binary script called encrypt, ive put it in /usr/bin and if i cd /usr/bin and then run it like 'encrypt password' it works fine.  if i try to run it from anywhere else using /usr/bin/encrypt password encrypt isnt found.
I thought by putting it in /usr/bin it would be in my path?
Side note: you should probably but it in /usr/local/bin
Than you can just "encrypt" at the cli  regardless of where you are
